mapper.update: update MER_ORDER_PRE_CHECK set ORDER_STATUS='0' ,CHECK_STATUS='2' where PLAT_SEQ_NBR in (select PLAT_SEQ_NBR from MER_ORDER_PRE_CHECK a, CHANNEL_MER_CHECK b where b.CHECK_STATUS='2' and b.ORDER_STATUS='0' and a.CHECK_STATUS='1')

mapper.select: select count(1) as TOTAL_COUNT,sum(TRANS_AMT) as TOTAL_AMT, sum(case when ORDER_STATUS='0' and CHECK_STATUS='2' then 1 else 0 end) as SUCCESS_COUNT, sum(case when ORDER_STATUS='0' and CHECK_STATUS='2' then TRANS_AMT else 0 end) as SUCCESS_AMT, sum(case when order_status='1' and check_status='2' then 1 else 0 end) as FAIL_COUNT, sum(case when order_status='1' and check_status='2' then TRANS_AMT else 0 end) as FAIL_AMT, sum(case when check_status='3' then 1 else 0 end) as UNCHECK_COUNT, sum(case when check_status='3' then TRANS_AMT else 0 end) as UNCHECK_AMT, MER_NO from MER_ORDER_PRE_CHECK where TRANS_DATE=#{checkDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by MER_NO
